website_summaries.verdict: If you need a large canopy for more than just lounging at the beach, this is one to consider. Ample space and reasonably stable design fill a variety of needs.
pros: Steel frame, wide canopy, and carrying case with wheels
cons: Setup is easier with a helper
Though build is sturdy, stability in windy conditions is iffy

website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive canopy that's a good pick if you want durability on a budget.
pros: Cathedral style roof offers plenty of head room and carrying case has wheels, adding convenience
cons: Not meant for use in strong winds

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: First time out and it failed. We had it fully secured at an art/music festival and were using it for our sales canopy. A quick storm came through and it leaked all over my wares. It pooled water and we kept dumping it.... then one of the beams snapped and the whole thing collapsed. We couldn't fold it back up and it was after sunset so I couldn't get a picture. So we have a leaky cover and no frame. Single use canopy I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Ison

customer_reviews.title: Sun yes, rain no
customer_reviews.text: We'll, being an Amazon purchaser and after reading the reviews I wanted to like it. It is definitely sturdier than ones I've been buying from big lots (gone through two). No leaks from rain but... the first rain that came though (second day of use) the frame collapsed. The metal pinched and buckled. Instead of draining off the water pooled and became too heavy. Fun in the sun and uv protection yes, rain no.
customer_reviews.author: hey

customer_reviews.title: Fragile tent, breaks easily.  But good customer service from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The vertical post of our first tent cracked after 7 months. Liked the product, assumed it was just a defective item. Amazon kindly replaced with an "enhanced" version supposed to be more durable. The second tent broke on the second use. Again, Amazon customer service was great to work with, but now ordering a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Brian F.

customer_reviews.title: You will be pleased with this canopy!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought canopies from Dicks and Walmart and this one is definitely sturdier and more economical. The frame is heavier and the fabric thicker. It is not that easy to put up; two people are needed. My 12 year old grandson helped me especially with the telescoping legs. I will leave it up all summer into early fall, lowering it when I can during strong winds and storms. The price and quality are much better than Quest, and Ozark Trail. The legs are straight, so it will provide nearly 100 square feet of shade.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Miccio

customer_reviews.title: IT IS NOT WATER PROOF
customer_reviews.text: 1. FABRIC HAS DEFECTS 2. SAME THICKNESS AS THE ORIGINAL VERSION 3. NOT WATER PROOF IMO DO NOT BUY! IF I COULD GIVE NO STARS I WOULD.
customer_reviews.author: SOY YO

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR CRAFT FAIR
customer_reviews.text: I needed a 10 x 10 canopy for a craft fair. It was delivered, but i didnt get a chamce to "test it out" before the event. The day of, i set it up (which was easy) and it worked perfect! We lad light wind and some other tents were blowing away, but mine stayed put. I added some twinkle lights and it was nice when the sun went down. I highly recommend this canopy!
customer_reviews.author: Keli Mcclour

customer_reviews.title: Used and broken merchandise.
customer_reviews.text: Opened up the canopy for the very first time at the beach and this is what we saw.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this with a tent that attaches to it. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: jennifer sharp

customer_reviews.title: Great canopy!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this canopy for camping and had our fingers crossed that it would be durable and easy to put up. So far so good! We didn’t have a problem getting it set up and taking it down is just as easy. The material seems to be durable as well. Also, we really love the bag (on wheels) for packing the canopy. Unlike most products, it actually fits back into the bag easily for storage!
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Bought the enhanced version. Thought it easy to put up. Some light did shine through the corners where the Velcro was but am not worried as I bought the 4yr warranty. Water beads right off and withstood heavy rains with no collections or water. For the price this is worth 5 stars. Similar canopy goes for 150/160$. Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this Item
customer_reviews.text: Great price, arrived sooner than expected.. That being said you get what you pay for typically and when it comes to pop up tents durability is a must. Product is made with thin plastic joints and flimsy steel post. When i received the tent the plastic elbows were split and I immediately returned the item to the nearest UPS store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Valuable
customer_reviews.text: I am looking for a tent for the coming summer for a while. My first time to buy it, compared price with other brands carefully. I am lucky, when I decided to place order, i found the grey one is on promotion, only half price of current price. So no double I will go for this one even though I prefer blue much better, since this grey one is so valuable. I am so happy spent half price to get one. It is easy to setup, everythings looks normal and look foward to spending our faimly trip with the tent for upcoming summer.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin James

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this tent if you like being dry
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to use in a craft fair, set it up first time and it starts raining. It leaks in the seams! I had to keep wiping water off of my stuff. My recommendation is to buy a nicer tent
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this same canopy about a year ago (cheaper) and it has been amazing. It has handled all decent weather thrown at it and I have touted it to many friends and family. I just bought another one in May 2020 and it broke the first weekend I took it out. Same tent side by side and the frame wisted in an odd way with a gust of no more than 10mph and the other one remains perfect. Disappointed for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel 9

customer_reviews.title: Good quality standard 10*10 canopy
customer_reviews.text: I got this canopy for 2019 summer local street fair. It made with very good quality material and very easy to set it up. It really can block strong sunlight in the summer time. The canopy can be carry and set it up by one person. If I dont use it, I just can fold it up and put it on the corner. This canopy is also easy to move around by small car, for example I put it into my SUV and go to street fair. Good quality with very attractive price. Highly recommend it for people want to do street fair, camping or party used.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Z.

customer_reviews.title: Quick, simple, effective and low cost.
customer_reviews.text: This 10 X 10 outdoor quickset canopy is exactly what I needed. Others may use this for farmers markets, street vendors, etc. I just needed some shade out on my property, where I'm doing a lot of hard work and no place to get out of the sun. It was really easy to set up. (Helpful hint: buy some 1 gallon jugs of water to use with the anchor strings and set them on the feet of the canopy. It's cheaper than any other alternative and less labor intensive than other methods. The little anchor pins are useless.) The canopy itself is great, well made and keeps the sun AND the rain off of you. Good purchase. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mikel Berry

customer_reviews.title: Good value, decent quality, not waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Good value overall, but it's not waterproof. It'll keep a light shower off for the most part, but for anything heavier than that, or longer than 20 minutes, then I recommend purchasing the more rugged version and getting a can of waterproofing spray with it. Amazon logo is only on one corner, so if you don't like that just rotate it towards the back.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gorton

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. I had 2 shipped and both were broken right out of the box. The pins that lock the top up pulled right off on the first one and the second one was missing a few nuts. I shipped the first one back and put the second on in the trash. Thankfully I got my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Iboughtthis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent canopy tent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought the white enhanced version one with used price tag which I found it a great deal to get a tent with decent quality like this. The tent came in a pretty heavy box with a wheeled carrier. It took me and my wife together about 30 min to set it up at my backyard . It is a very decent tent but only for the sunshade not for the rains and the mechanics I suggest to reinforce the structure with more sturdy pattern. The made materials are high quality. I got this with used price but still brand new in the box. A good deal anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Todd B.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great and was easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: My wife, three friends and I went to an all day event that we had attended before. The last time it was so hot that we decided to purchase a canopy tent. Well, the best deal I could find was the Amazon Basics Pop-Up Canopy Tent - 10' x 10', Grey. It did a great job and was easy to put up and take down. We were able to be in the shade, and it made us much more comfortable than without it. Our neighbors were amazed at the price and the quality.
customer_reviews.author: DJK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for  a  party
customer_reviews.text: We were having a large party where our guests were going to spend most of the time outside. The temps were hovering in the 90s so we knew we were going to need more shade than what we have. After looking at renting a canopy and not liking the cost, we found this at an excellent price and hoped for the best. This canopy more than beat our expectations. It is extremely easy to put up and take down. Several guests even commented on what a nice, sturdy canopy it is. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my event
customer_reviews.text: These worked great. I actually ordered 4 of them for a festival I was helping coordinate and they worked great. I set them up Friday afternoon and they stayed up until Saturday evening. They worked great, didn't tip, came with strings and stakes to keep them in place in case there was wind (there was a little but didn't seem to affect them.) The cases also have wheels which was a nice upside I wasn't expecting. All in all a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: bobwrong

customer_reviews.title: Collapsed during it's first rain.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the back yard to combat the Texas sun during the summer. Canopy collapsed during the first rain. Flimsy rods and plastic joints broken. Design seems fine, but the materials are garbage. Glad my kids weren't under it when it happened. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Never again.
customer_reviews.text: Would not purchase again. First one was broken on delivery, the second brok within hours of setting up. Cheap plastic fasteners break all the time. For $80 it shouldn’t break so quickly. Then I returned the first one, again broken when arrived, and was charged a stupid amount for shipping. This thing is now an $80 tarp in my garage. Useless
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Palac

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken, but trusted amazon so did not realize until out on a camping trip
customer_reviews.text: First off, I am a frequent Amazon buyer. We purchased this product hoping that we would receive a “functional” product. I bought this item back in December and didn’t think twice that it would be broken when I went to use it. However when my family and I arrived at a campsite this past weekend. We opened up the canopy only to find it was broken and completely non-functional. So now I am stuck with a broken product, never used before and I am past my refund date. Disappointed and frustrated is an understatement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thought was going to be a great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our annual river trip. Unfortunately it did not even last the 1st day of use. A gust of wind came and that was it one of the bars snapped. The EZUP brand and even the Ozark brand survived the gust. All were tied down the same so I guess this one is just not that sturdy. I had such high hope's, it being an Amazon brand. :(
customer_reviews.author: Diana M.

customer_reviews.title: fun time in the park
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this tent for since the day it was delivered. I live right across from the park so I spend most of my weekend time at there with my kids. The instruction of the setup is easy to understand and not too much work required setting it up due to its folding steel frame structure. It’s sturdy and gives us full cover from the sun. My kids are having fun in the park while this tent gives us UV protection from the sun. Amazon also have a 1-year replacement policy on this item so I have no worry if it will break down or what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Lily C

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but seems to be of good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pop-up tent for an indoor event a few weeks ago. The canvas felt pretty decent, although obviously not commercial quality (which is not to be expected at this price point). The setup requires 2 people, but it's pretty easy. The tent did not feel flimsy, either, and the packaging was good. I also greatly like the bag with wheels that this comes with! Definitely worth it at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: What i needed.
customer_reviews.text: First, the canopy was a lifesaver on a recent camping trip to the desert. It is a bit difficult for two small women to put up the first time. Maybe the stiffness will be less with repeated use. It is also difficult to repack. I believe this is true of most of this type of canopy. After three days use a gust of wind came up and toppled the canopy in spite of weights on the legs. This broke a strut. Amazon sent me a replacement within the week. All in all, this is a good canopy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ryssa

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 weeks. A gust of wind smashed the ...
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 2 weeks. A gust of wind smashed the frame in 4 places. Making it impossible to repair. Rip off in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: RichieRich69

customer_reviews.title: Performed as needed
customer_reviews.text: We bought this canopy for a recent beach trip and we are so very pleased with our purchase. Just took things slow and easy and it went up like a dream. We did include sandbags with our order just to be on the safe side. We did not expect it to be waterproof but luckily we had no rain. We took the cover off at night and it was easy to put back on the next day. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AA=AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Great product, No White Side option at the time of purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love the Popup. I use Name brand popups for work. We bought this amazon basics one for camping, specifically for a desert trip. It worked phenomenal. It comes with stakes and rope to secure the tent even though we used our own, fantastic that those are included. The only bummer and the reason for 4/5 stars is that there was no option to purchase matching popup sides at the time of my purchase. I cannot speak for current availability. I do highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a popup tent.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: is not easy to assemble as they say
customer_reviews.text: This tent, although really big, is not easy to assemble as they say. It's REALLY hard to assemble and you absolutely need help. I am a petite 110lb girl who needed this for outdoor markets and I cannot for the life of me assemble it myself. You need to pull the legs up for them to lock in place but it's really hard to pull. I need at least one or 2 other people who are strong to help.
customer_reviews.author: marta

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, but very heavy.
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars for very sturdy, and well made and great value! But it is SO heavy that ireturned it. It's too big for what I need, and would be very difficult to carry by myself. This isn't a good "going on a picnic" type canopy. It is beryeady to set up with two people, but just too heavy for me. It's also quite long in the bag, so it might not fit in a smaller size car trunk.
customer_reviews.author: SkiUtah

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as described.
customer_reviews.text: It's much heavier than as listed - it means a workout getting it to wear you want to be. Also the actual coverage is less than stated: it's 10'x10' dues to legs going out at an angle. The canopy itself is 8'x8', giving you 64 sq feet of shade rather than 100.
customer_reviews.author: Francis H. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: So easy to store, move and put up.  Only a few minutes and you're done.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with with this pop-up canopy tent. It is very easy to assembly and put away, the design is sturdy and the color of the polyester top is a nice, cheerful blue. It is bigger than I expected and will provide lots of shade for several people. I am six feet tall and there is plenty of headroom. I was especially surprised and happy to find that the storage bag has wheels and handles to make moving the set around easy. I would highly recommend your purchase of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tom B.

customer_reviews.title: Cover damage
customer_reviews.text: I had an event that required me to use a tent/canopy. I ordered this hoping that it would be sturdy enough for my needs. The frame was fine but the cover was dirty (dark marks) and thin areas where the sunlight revealed wear from being in the package. I wanted to get a discount but the only thing they offered was a refund. Since I had to use it I am stuck with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Alberta G. Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for tailgating, not at all suited for beaches with any winds.
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful the strings would help keep down this tent in breezy Charleston, SC area beaches but alas it didn't stand the chance. I bought the sturdier version thinking that would help, but all that does is make it heaver and thus an even more dangerous thing to launch into the wind. This is ideal for tailgating but not designed for beaches with any real breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: canopy already ripped
customer_reviews.text: Only used this twice and as we were setting it up the second time noticed its already got 2 holes/tears in it. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Heather G.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a dozen uses.
customer_reviews.text: This is not that easy to set up alone. Two people nearly essential. And it has now broken after a dozen uses. I am disappointed and hope Amazon will offer to replace
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Keller

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: I would rate this as a medium to high strength compared to most shelters on the market. I have better ones and worse ones. But the price is very good. I now have 2 of them and will be ordering a 3rd after using the 2 this past weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy the beach barbecue that blocks the sun
customer_reviews.text: This one is quality and I can set this up with no help very quickly by myself. It came with a sturdy bag with wheels and rubber handles for easy transport. With it! Go to the beach barbecue, you don't have to think about the hot sun! You know the weather in Florida, what is the unobstructed beach barbecue! Great! Can be a small table! A barbecue! Can also have four chairs!
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy tent for the price
customer_reviews.text: The tent came in on time and as expected. The assembly was somewhat difficult - it took using a pair of clamps to get the sides completed locked. However, once assembled it was rugged and held up well in windy weather. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JOSEPH M. DIGIOIA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended. No complaints. Easy to set up with one person if needed, but easier to set up with two or more. I recommend buying the coleman wall that hooks onto these canopys! it works greats with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Uptergrove

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfect. One man operation
customer_reviews.text: I didn't set this up until my first show. One man can install it, but two would be faster. Instructions say the leave canopy attached to framework with taken down. It will be badly wrinkled if you do. Remove it and fold nicely and it will look like new when you reuse it.. Good quality unit...
customer_reviews.author: Hiker

customer_reviews.title: Do not Buy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to keeping this for a long time and it was not what is described. It's not waterproof and the leg stands are weak. It doesn't stay on. This seems like a disposable one-time-only use. The materials seem cheap. The worst part is that it was difficult how to fold it back without breaking it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Yauewl

customer_reviews.title: So easy to set-up and take down.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use as sun cover for a church function. As it turned out, it rained. Perfect for the rain as well. It set up quickly in the downpour and was able to be moved out of the line of traffic to dry off the next day prior to taking down. Thought take down and putting back in the storage bag might be tough but it was as easy as the set up. Highly recommend. In fact, considering a second one for next events.
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: Nothing easy about this pop up
customer_reviews.text: Between two of us we could not get this to go all the way up. No matter how expanded it was or how hard we push, we couldn't get the sides to lock into place so it just kept collapsing back down on us. I'm glad I tried it out first before my art festival so I knew to replace it before next weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Not for weekly use
customer_reviews.text: First, we tried repurchase a canopy tent (CROWN SHADES Patented 10ft x 10ft Outdoor Pop up Portable Shade Instant Folding Canopy with Carry Bag, White) via the 'Buy It Again' but we were sent this canopy tent of lower quality and is not as easy to put up. This broke within a couple months (we use it several times a week). We requested a replacement item which we received and now that replacement is broken as well after just a couple months of use. I definitely do not recommend this item for frequent use or if you expect it to last you. Buy quality, buy less.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Luke

customer_reviews.title: IT EVERYTHING IN TACT?
customer_reviews.text: I took the pop up to the beach with 3 grandchildren that where visiting. Upon opening up the frame, I discovered one of the scissor bars was not connected at the top of the frame. It had a bolt missing. Searched all over and could not find a bolt that may have failed out of the unit. We could not use it. Very disappointed and requested a return and credit which Amazon quickly agreed to do. Very happy with Amazon's customer service in spite of the defective product.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Brasfield

customer_reviews.title: Good tent
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Easy to put up and take down. Comes in convenient bag. Slightly hard to roll on the wheels due to the position of the handles. Might as well carry it. Kind of heavy. My canopy had a slight defect in it which makes me nervous it will rip.there soon but I needed it for an event the day it came in so I still had to use it or else I would hve returned it for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: The Amazon Basics Pop-Up Canopy Tent is a very nice product, it has a gray color ,which makes itself look more comfortable mentally.It also reflects the light , so I would usually use it for the camp during the summer, it also cool down the temperature surround me that will not make me feel hot while i am laying on the ground. As a customer of it , I would recommend it to you guys.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect...
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it 5 stars but it came missing a bolt at one of the connections! Fortunately I had something that would work but definitely frustrating as it was in a sealed bag meaning it obviously left the factory like that! Otherwise a great product. Very sturdy and heavy gauge steel! Solid product that should last me years.
customer_reviews.author: Speck

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the canopy and on the second time using the canopy, the metal folding side broke. While I realize that the canopy is cheaper than many other products, I strongly encourage you to purchase a better quality canopy. The second time upon use is unacceptable and I wouldn't want anyone to purchase something of such poor durability. One positive of the product, however, is the bag. The canopy is easy to get in and out of the bag even after the first use where things usually don't seem to fit right after opening.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Mueth

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof & easy set up & take down
customer_reviews.text: We were having a party in my backyard & After hearing the weather report we decided to purchase a tent , we picked this one & actually ordered 3. They arrived the next day as promised with prime , during the start of our party a very strong winded rain storm came through all 3 tents held up & were waterproof . We are so happy with our purchase that we will keep all 3. After my brother in law saw the tents he ordered himself one that night & is extremely happy also
customer_reviews.author: Lisa c.

customer_reviews.title: It works great with easy set up
customer_reviews.text: For a pop-up this thing is great! We’ve used it at the lake, at car shows, for park days, and to spend the day just about anywhere. It’s sturdy, easy to set up, and came with little ropes that we use to tie down to our coolers to make sure it doesn’t blow away.
customer_reviews.author: EMorrow

customer_reviews.title: The tent is quite heavy to carry around, Which is good thing because means it is steady.
customer_reviews.text: The tent is quite heavy to carry around, Which is good thing because means it is steady. You would need at least 2 people to expand this thing. The only complain I have is when you have 2 people to expand this, you have the other two hanging and had to walk around to stretch it slowly. The wheel sort of working only on the flat surface. If you have bumpy surface, it would be difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this tent and was very excited to receive it but it arrived damaged when I set it up to use. Seems as thought they forgot to put in one of the connectors. Therefore it's not useable.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Great pop up, easy to set up, the top hook and loops in place and comes with steaks to help keep it down. Cons are that it is hvy, also the steaks are flimsy but they work. Pro, sturdy and easy storage bag with wheels
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. It was shipped from China. The box was thin and tore. The whole box bottom was open. The poles were bent and canopy was ripped/tore. I was very disappointed. I ordered Ozark Trail from Walmart.com and had no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband about a week ago,this tent is exactly what we wanted and more. hoping we would get a lot of use from it at our football tailgating. We put it together with the help of our son in about 5 minutes and it worked great all weekend. Would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: It is very sturdy contraption easy to put up. I could it up myself except it takes 2 people to pull out fully so that umbrella is up...couldn’t believe the quality for such a low price.my kids can enjoy it in the summer
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Quality is hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: The first one I purchased had no issues I bought another one because of that. When I received and opened, it was broken. Exchanged it and the replacement had a minor issue but was able to fix myself. For the money they are good enough
customer_reviews.author: MA01749

customer_reviews.title: Should only be used as a shade canopy.
customer_reviews.text: Took this to a festival in the Ozarks and the second a rain swell came through, the wind shredded the canopy to bits. We had even lowered the canopy to the ground to avoid this from occurring.
customer_reviews.author: BMcK

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING/WELL WORTH ANY PRICE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is worth $1 million !!!! It has been up for almost 3 months now. I have it covering my deck while waiting on a roof, it has survived serval heavy rain falls. Recently got picked up and tossed around by severe storm With a little duck tape my child & i put it back up. I totally 100% recommend this thing!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price, but don't expect it to last
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine so I could write outdoors, even when it's raining. It did its job well for about a week or so, but has already begun developing leaks. These are pretty small and fixable with duct tape, but it's still a disappointment. It does a good job of providing shade, at least.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love it. We live in central Texas and have no shade. This popped up easily and provides great shade. We've had 3 big storms come through and it hasn't damaged it at all.
customer_reviews.author: tabitha

customer_reviews.title: GRRRRRRR
customer_reviews.text: So I still do t have my tent. Been almost 2 weeks. That’s because it’s at the POST OFFICE. Y would you send something so large and heavy through the mail? I’m handicapped I really don’t want to have to go pick up this tent that was so bulky the mail person couldn’t fit in her vehicle. This tent better be some special orbits going back. Grrrrr
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Broke when trying to put up - can't be put up by one person
customer_reviews.text: So .. this broke when I tried to put it up. I could also not get this put up by myself even had it not broke and I bought like 4 of them to put up in our dog areas for shade .. not sure what I am supposed to do now with them and will have to buy something else that I can put up by myself.
customer_reviews.author: K. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter & I set up the canopy to make sure we could do it before going to a craft event. Was easy enough for us to do. Also, it appears to be nice and sturdy. The shipping was so fast! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: grandma_deal

customer_reviews.title: Broke the first time we used it in 10mph wind
customer_reviews.text: Just a FYI - we used it for the first time this weekend and it broke during 10mph wind. :( Super bummed about it as it is useless anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Lasted Ok Until Wind
customer_reviews.text: Took this canopy to the beach for two weeks. It survived for the majority of the time, however on it's 8th day it was windy and caused several of the supports that hold the canopy up to bend significantly. It still works, it just doesn't look as appealing.
customer_reviews.author: JKaid

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: I saw the videos online how to setup this gazebo and even they had trouble doing so. Who in their right mind designed something this large that requires pushing of each side up while it fights you back. Absolute waste of money, wish I never bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg F

customer_reviews.title: sturdy poles but poor top securement
customer_reviews.text: Ive had cheap easy ups before and this one has good base and legs. However, the canopy has no velcro straps or any other securement along the middle or edges. the only securement for the top is a patch of velcro at each corner leg. So any wind at all will have the edges being lifted or flapping. If it had more points of securement I would of given this a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Troy k w

customer_reviews.title: Best option for the price
customer_reviews.text: Set this up as a semi-permanent canopy in my back yard to protect my grilling area. In the 2 weeks I've had it, it has already survived 2 thunderstorms. I set it up by myself (wasn't super easy, but doable as these normally take at least 2 people) and it's anchored at all 4 feet worry additional cinder blocks. The frame is solid and the canopy is waterproof. Great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Heisler

customer_reviews.title: Durable, unlike the cheap ones bought in most stores.
customer_reviews.text: Meets all expectations. Its gone from high winds on the beach to rainy days at car shows. Update ** i had issue with the wind bending one of the upper arms. Amazon set me a while new tent! 10 months afyer purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Check well before using
customer_reviews.text: Ordered before a camp trip. Didn’t bother checking it before leaving. Took it out at campsite only to find two broken parts. Wasn’t able to use it. The wheel on the bag was also broken
customer_reviews.author: Marty90

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed! Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy it. I bought this for my friend birthday party. Today first time out and it doesn’t work well. Not very sturdy, We didn’t feel safe when we built it. And It's raining today, we had to remove everything because it kept leaking. So terrible, I just received it yesterday, but I have to choose to return. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Jane c

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Covers my entire deck and really transformed my garden experience. now I can sit outside when it's raining and stay nice and dry, and it's about 10 degrees cooler under the canopy when it's sunny out. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Carin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: The tent is perfect for what I need it for.set up quickly and easily.come with a carrying case so that it is easy to tote around.
customer_reviews.author: gang 24oz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!! Great tent!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This tent is sturdy! Took some time to understand how to set it up, but I’m generally not good with that stuff...lol. Perfect for parties!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Not water proof!
customer_reviews.text: I used this three times total. Once without rain, and twice in the rain. It leaked during the second use in the rain. My first "ez-up" I bought a Wal-Mart lasted from 2009 to 2018 without any leaks or mechanical issues. This Amazon product is not a good buy if you plan on using it in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Dave P

customer_reviews.title: A-OK!
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with this pop up canopy. It is very sturdy and large and easy to put up. No complaints at all. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Cory A

customer_reviews.title: Canopy LEAKS!
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely not the leak proof. I just put it up, it is raining, and there are plenty of drips coming from the canopy. I don’t know how it will hold up through the summer. If you want to keep an area dry.....This is not the right canopy.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya D.

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a used pop up tent and received a broken and rusted frame with no awning. I missed the return date because of moving and am SOL.
customer_reviews.author: Amandajo

customer_reviews.title: Can you help me
customer_reviews.text: Love the canopy and will give it a 5 star if I can get the leg working properly. When putting the canopy away, appears one of the silver push buttons on the legs has disappeared. It won't pop out and be visable to lock the leg into place. Any idea where the push button has gone? How do we retrieve the push button or get it fixed so the leg will lock into place? Thanks, Dan dangallanar@gmail.com
customer_reviews.author: KathleenG

customer_reviews.title: As Described & Good for Price
customer_reviews.text: Definitely takes two to setup. Quality appears good, as is the frame. This one covers our hot tub and should provide very good shade Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Will Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Fine for shade but rain will collapse the canopy
customer_reviews.text: Bought to keep rain off my cat tree in the back yard, first rain it collapsed. The metal in the roof supports broke
customer_reviews.author: Erik Szablowski

customer_reviews.title: Simply junk!
customer_reviews.text: What an absolutely junk product! Decided I'd set it up today before taking it out for the first time tomorrow and I couldn't even fully extend it! One of the arms broke before I could even fully depoly the whole thing! Decided to pack it up and go with a different brand, Amazon can't be trusted!
customer_reviews.author: Deya Ammar

customer_reviews.title: Great for indoors or non windy days
customer_reviews.text: If it's windy these are awful. Wind will break these. This tent it for sun block only. I installed these correctly. I used all the stakes and it still blew away at the event. Cheap metal. The metal actually bent in on itself and broke in half
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stay away! Low quality, flimsy, breaks easily, and Amazon does NOT stand behind the product
customer_reviews.text: Awful product with ZERO support from Amazon. Broke within 10 minutes of setting it up in low winds (10 mph gusts). We disposed of the sharp metal pieces and Amazon refuses to refund or replace without us shipping back the broken pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B

customer_reviews.title: Easy assemble,  good build
customer_reviews.text: Blue tent, my favorite color, not only that, the all set looks nice, aluminum frame which will stand on crucial weather and not getting rusted. Amazon's products are always reasonable price and good quality, you will not go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: The.K.J

customer_reviews.title: Sunburned
customer_reviews.text: I have a white version from 2019, but mine did not come with the silver undersiding as depicted in these new photos. I liked the tent in general, but then we used it in the sun for a couple of hours and my baby and I got terribly sunburned while sitting in its shade. I believe the thin white tent is just reflective without the silver protective layer.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: that not you want
customer_reviews.text: It is so bad,I want buy put my back garden and I can play with my kid when in sunmer.but when I get it,it is not water proof,and then single use canopy,when raining and storm coming,that will be broken,I dont want waste money and I will return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and very durable. Stakes don't hold in strong winds, but they warn you of that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saved us all summer
customer_reviews.text: This has saved us all summer at my sons baseball tournaments. Super easy to set up for 2 people and super sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Naustin

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put up
customer_reviews.text: Very, very hard to put up. Took 3 of us up do it. Not meant for short people to do. I am 5 foot 2 and couldn’t reach it. After it was up it looked nice and kept sun and rain out.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna L. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Glad it didn't rain!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for my son's wedding. It was easy to install but the top was full of tiny holes throughout the top. Very disappointed....glad it didnt rain!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacknsons

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Price was great. Goes up fast and protects whatever is under it from the rain. NOT for windy conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: Product can not withstand the lighter of breezes. When it rains one side poodles up and will collapse frame. I have replaced it 4 times for the same exact thing to happen. Horrible product do not waste your money. The Iberian was useless in this case.
customer_reviews.author: joshua grace

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics Pop-Up Canopy Tent - 10' x 10', Blue
feature_bullets: Blue pop-up canopy tent with durable steel frame and cathedral-style roof for maximum headroom
Angled leg design provides 96 square feet of shade; polyester top provides 99% UV protection from the sun's harmful rays
White powder-coat finish on high-grade steel frame helps prevent chipping, peeling, rust, and corrosion
Not recommended for use in prolonged rain or during strong wind; wheeled bag for easy transport included
Measures 118.1 by 118.1 by 96.5 inches; weighs 43.66 pounds; backed by an AmazonBasics 1-year limited warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars544 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
